attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: requiring petitions to achieve 10 signatures in the first ten days after posting.  If a proposer cannot muster 10 friends/colleagues to add their names the petition is probably worthless and should not "clutter" the web site and devalue the whole process.

rejection.details: Many thanks for this feedback. We will consider your proposal.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
